Shadow Wing::

She started to feel the effects of the seditive.  She fell into a 
deep sleep as her body started to chage from the virus.  Her body 
started to reformat.  It was loosing it's robotic properties and 
started to become more organic.  She was becoming more bear and owl 
than tranformer.  Her only robotic feature was her head.  Her body 
changed, it had a metal skeleton, but the rest of her was organic.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis stepped back, recoiling from the sight of Shadow Wing 
lashing out.
> The CR chamber sensed the struggling and released a sedative into 
the fluid
> surrounding Shadow Wing. that would calm her down and reduce the 
chance of
> damage to either her or the chamber. The down side was that the 
sedative was
> now another factor in the virus. he knew that mixxing chemicals was 
a bad
> idea, especially when one doesn't know the result of the first 
factor.
> Veratis stepped back to the sensors and watched carefully for the 
results of
> the virus.
> 
>
